files.content:
aws_region  = "us-east-1"
name        = "tribute"
environment = "dev"

# For az_count=3, also provide 3 CIDRs in each list.
az_count = 2

public_subnet_cidrs  = ["10.0.0.0/24", "10.0.1.0/24"]
private_subnet_cidrs = ["10.0.10.0/24", "10.0.11.0/24"]

single_nat_gateway = true

cluster_version = "1.29"

node_instance_types = ["t3.medium"]
node_desired_size   = 2
node_min_size       = 1
node_max_size       = 4

ecr_repository_name = "tribute"

tags = {
  Project = "tribute"
}
